sub_title: Project manager | Project leader in Pharma and Biology
summary: Educated in biomedical sciences/biochemistry I am an expert in protein production, isolation and purification from cellular systems. I have obtained a comprehensive knowledge of current developments in this field and my focus lies within the biopharmaceutical industry. Through my experience in the role as project manager in a clinical research organization (CRO) I realize I excel in a fast pace and highly demanding field through strong analytical and communication skills with the capability of timely delivery of complex and challenging projects within budget. I typically face challenges with an optimistic and open mind that is always focused on the solution. I Believe in a work environment were collaboration and personal attention for your team members is mandatory to reach common goals and deliver high quality products to customers.

o	Management of multiple projects and supervision of young researchers simultaneously. Experienced in identifying milestones and adherence to timelines and deliverables
